# Symbol of Fear (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp each)

**Range:** 0 ft.; see text

**Effect:** One symbol

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 356

This spell functions like *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within 60 feet of the *symbol of fear* instead become [[Panicked|panicked]] for 1 round per caster level.

*Note*: Magic traps such as *symbol of fear* are hard to detect and disable. A rogue (only) can use the [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] skill to find a *symbol of fear* and [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] to thwart it. The DC in each case is 25 +  spell level, or 31 for *symbol of fear*.
